attributes.action: End the TV Licence fee and make the BBC fund itself by other means.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC should be funding itself and not have the monopoly to decide who can have a TV and who cannot
attributes.background: The BBC (after the recent scandal) has shown that they are no longer reliable or credible in providing impartial news.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586818
